message:
Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur wishes everyone a Happy Dussehra!! May this Dussehra burn all your worries with Ravana and bring you loads of happiness.

The first step towards change is awareness, the second step is acceptance. It is a well known fact that awareness is the key to success. If you have it- Teach it & if you lack it- Seek it. 
Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur and AmbujaNeotia announces Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive(EAD) 2017, a chain of Inspiring Guest lectures & Panel discussions throughout the country in order to awaken the entrepreneur inside you!
Register now: www.ead.ecell-iitkgp.org
#EAD2k17

message:
Google has announced that it will acquire TC corporation's smartphone division for $1.1 billion in an all-cash deal. The deal includes a transfer of about 2000 employees of HTC to Google.
In addition to the team, Google will also have access to HTC's intellectual property to support the Pixel smartphone family.

#EAD_2k17

Google has announced that it will acquire TC corporation's smartphone division for $1.1 billion in an all-cash deal. The deal includes a transfer of about 2000 employees of HTC to Google.
In addition to the team, Google will also have access to HTC's intellectual property to support the Pixel smartphone family.

Life is filled with difficulties, which we wish to solve as soon as possible. But, thanks to a few people, we have invented machines for almost everything which we do manually. 
Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur wishes all the unsung heroes of the world, the engineers, a Happy Engineers Day.

message:
Entrepreneurship is not a career option, it is a dynamic lifestyle.
Entrepreneurs put a lot of effort into their startups, and receive leaps and bounds more than they invested.
Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur brings the soul and spirit of entrepreneurship to your city, the Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive ( EAD ) 2017. 
Witness great entrepreneurs of your city share their experience and knowledge, and unearth the entrepreneur in you.
Stay tuned for registrations !

On Tuesday, Amancio Ortega, founder of ZARA clothing, 81, overtook tech supremo and and Microsoft founder Bill Gates to take the top spot on the global rich-list.
Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur congratulates Amancio Ortega for streaking ahead to leave a £155million gap between him and Gates!

On Tuesday, Amancio Ortega, founder of ZARA clothing, 81, overtook tech supremo and and Microsoft founder Bill Gates to take the top spot on the global rich-list.

After fintech company Capital Float and Mukesh Bansal and Ankit Nagori's cure.fit, budget-hotel tech company, Treebo Hotels has raised Series C funding of $34 million led by Hong-Kong based investment firms Ward Ferry Management and Karst Peak Capital. Existing investors SAIF Partners, Bertelsmann India Investments and Matrix Partners also participated in the round.
The funds are said to be used for building budget hotels, improving customer experience and expansion.

After fintech company Capital Float and Mukesh Bansal and Ankit Nagori's cure.fit, budget-hotel tech company, Treebo Hotels has raised Series C funding of $34 million led by Hong-Kong based investment firms Ward Ferry Management and Karst Peak Capital. Existing investors SAIF Partners, Bertelsmann India Investments and Matrix Partners also participated in the round.
The funds are said to be used for building budget hotels, improving customer experience and expansion.

Existing investors SAIF Partners, Bertelsmann India Investments and Matrix Partners also participated in the round.
The funds are said to be used for building budget hotels, improving customer experience and expansion.

Existing investors SAIF Partners, Bertelsmann India Investments and Matrix Partners also participated in the round.
The funds are said to be used for building budget hotels, improving customer experience and expansion.

Age is just a number. You can keep procrastinating all the initiatives you want to implement in the world, or you can start taking action right now!
Make The World Wonderful is a pilot project of iB Hubs, led by four 18 year old girls!
Their Journey is one which would inspire everyone to start changing the world through small steps to make the biggest impact.
Be a part of the event, where they share their experiences and future plans!
Venue - Kalidas Auditorium
Date - 29th August 2017
Time - 6:30PM

After weeks of resignation of former Uber CEO Travis Kalanick, Uber will appoint Expedia's Dara Khosrowshahi as the new CEO to steer head the global ride-hailing leviathan. 
Dara Khosrowshahi will face a number of hurdles as Uber, which has raised more than $15 billion from private investors, navigates its way toward a still-unscheduled initial public offering and a high-stakes trade secrets suit filed by Alphabet's Waymo.

After weeks of resignation of former Uber CEO Travis Kalanick, Uber will appoint Expedia's Dara Khosrowshahi as the new CEO to steer head the global ride-hailing leviathan.

Ever wondered how stock markets worked? Well, its not that easy. But, what if you had a practical simulation right in front of you!
Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur in association with ICICIdirect brings StockMind 6.0 to the IIT Kharagpur campus. 
Date - 26th August 2017
Time - 4.30 pm
Venue - Vikramshila V2
Witness virtual stock simulations, followed by a competition with virtual money to invest within the market hours! Prizes worth INR 20,000 at stake!

After the resignation of Vishal Sikka from Infosys, Nandan Nilekani has been appointed as the non-executive Chairman of the Board.
This appointment is being seen as the best choice for Infosys for the coming days, after years of internal management bouts plaguing the company. Hopefully, Nandan Nilekani will be able to steer Infosys to a position of former strength until a new CEO is appointed in the next financial year.

After the resignation of Vishal Sikka from Infosys, Nandan Nilekani has been appointed as the non-executive Chairman of the Board.
This appointment is being seen as the best choice for Infosys for the coming days, after years of internal management bouts plaguing the company. Hopefully, Nandan Nilekani will be able to steer Infosys to a position of former strength until a new CEO is appointed in the next financial year.

An Entrepreneur is someone who jumps off a cliff & builds a plane on the way down.
Taking risks is a part of our daily lives, but the person who sees the reward, is an entrepreneur. An exciting time of entrepreneurial extravaganza & mind boggling issues is coming your way! Get ready to know what it takes to be an entrepreneur, and how entrepreneurs have changed your daily life!
#Freshers_Teaser

Softbank invests a huge amount of capital in Flipkart, reported to be atleast $2.5 Billion dollars. With this funding round, Flipkart now has about $ 4 Billion extra on its balance sheet. 
This is the biggest investment ever in the Indian E-commerce ecosystem. With this round, Flipkart has now raised more than $6 billion in cash since starting out in 2007!

You don't need 100 person company to develop an Idea!
- Larry Page
You just need few good FRIENDS!

Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur wishes you a very Happy Friendship Day.
